GMCM.ModEnabled.Name: Enable Mod?
GMCM.ModEnabled.Tooltip: Whether or not the mod is enabled.
GMCM.ChestChance.Name: Treasure Chance
GMCM.ChestChance.Tooltip: The chance of getting a Fishing Treasure Chest.
GMCM.VanillaMultiplier.Name: Vanilla Items Multiplier
GMCM.VanillaMultiplier.Tooltip: Multiplies the amount of vanilla loot you receive.
GMCM.ModdedMultiplier.Name: Modded Items Multiplier
GMCM.ModdedMultiplier.Tooltip: How many times to redo the custom item creation for fishing treasure chests.
GMCM.EnableBlacklist.Name: Enable Blacklist
GMCM.EnableBlacklist.Tooltip: Whether or not to enable the item blacklist. WARNING: This will allow the obtaining of certain broken items.
GMCM.MoneyPrize.Name: Treasure Gold Reward
GMCM.MoneyPrize.Tooltip: How much Gold to receive upon fishing up a treasure chest.
GMCM.VanillaFluctuation.Name: Treasure Chance Fluctuation
GMCM.VanillaFluctuation.Tooltip: Whether or not to include vanilla fluctuations in treasure chest change (like magnet bait).
GMCM.PriceMin.Name: Price Minimum
GMCM.PriceMin.Tooltip: The minimum price a treasure item can be.
GMCM.PriceMax.Name: Price Maximum
GMCM.PriceMax.Tooltip: The maximum price a treasure item can be. Use negative numbers to set no maximum.
GMCM.AllowSilver.Name: Allow Silver Quality Items
GMCM.AllowSilver.Tooltip: Whether or not to allow silver quality items in treasure chests.
GMCM.SilverProb.Name: Silver Quality Probability
GMCM.SilverProb.Tooltip: The probability for silver quality items. Evaluated AFTER gold and iridium.
GMCM.AllowGold.Name: Allow Gold Quality Items
GMCM.AllowGold.Tooltip: Whether or not to allow gold quality items in treasure chests.
GMCM.GoldProb.Name: Gold Quality Probability
GMCM.GoldProb.Tooltip: The probability for gold quality items. Evaluated AFTER iridium.
GMCM.AllowIridium.Name: Allow Iridium Quality Items
GMCM.AllowIridium.Tooltip: Whether or not to allow iridium quality items in treasure chests.
GMCM.IridiumProb.Name: Iridium Quality Probability
GMCM.IridiumProb.Tooltip: The probability for iridium quality items. Evaluated FIRST.
GMCM.IncludeModded.Name: Include Modded Items
GMCM.IncludeModded.Tooltip: Whether to include non-vanilla fishing treasure chest items. Takes precedence.
GMCM.AllowedContext.Name: Included Context Tags
GMCM.AllowedContext.Tooltip: Context Tags to add to the loot pool. Separate with ",". If an item is already allowed by category, it will have a bonus chance via context tags. (FINICKY)
GMCM.ContextProb.Name: Context Tag Inclusion Chance
GMCM.ContextProb.Tooltip: Chance to include an item from the list of context tags. (FINICKY)
GMCM.IncludeExpBooks.Name: Include Exp Books
GMCM.IncludeExpBooks.Tooltip: Whether to include Exp Books in the modded item loot-table.
GMCM.ExpBooksChance.Name: Exp Book Chance
GMCM.ExpBooksChance.Tooltip: The chance to get an Exp Book.
